nodes.text: This sport was a ball sport played on a field. Known teams included ITP, Memo Sphere U and All Zectorn. Manac-Nebut played this game.

This game usually involved deaths and explosions, as players competed to snatch the receptacles from other players in order to score spectrals or TDs. A field of this game included fractal chasms, barricades, mine fields and trenches.

This sport was mentioned in a segment called "Prospects", written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
